overview:
Pietro is the General Manager of TheBlogTV.

Previously, he was Chief Market Officer at bravoo!, the Istanbul-based start-up leader in the multiplatform directive advertising market in Turkey.When COO at Consodata, he was part of the team that planned, managed and successfully completed the turnaround of the company, leader in the Italian direct marketing sector. Before that, Pietro was one of the founders of a Corporate Incubator and also participated in the start-up of a mobile telephony carrier as Director of Internet and Interactive Services. Pietro started his career at Bain & Co. Italy where, as Senior Manager, worked on a wide variety of strategic and operative projects in the TLC, media and banking sectors, both in Italy and abroad.

Pietro holds an MBA from Columbia Business School, New York and a Law Degree from UniversitÃ  di Sassari, Italy.
